publicwhip.spmotion: S3M-4540 Willie Coffey: James Hamilton Academy, Determined to Succeed—That the Parliament congratulates James Hamilton Academy on winning the Determined to Succeed Most Enterprising Secondary School Award; notes the school’s commitment to helping pupils of all ages develop entrepreneurial skills; further notes that the awards recognised a variety of activities and achievements in entrepreneurship, enterprise awareness and support for new pupils; welcomes the support given to the school by local businesses and bodies, including Lochaven Knitwear, East Ayrshire Council, Scottish Power and Kilmarnock FC and that these business partners regularly contribute to the school with input in classroom lessons, site visits and peer mentoring, and congratulates head teacher Janis Teale, the staff and pupils on this tremendous achievement.
